"グワナーダの大ばさみの調達":
"My knives are getting dull too fast. I'd
like to replace them with something more
reliable. I know you're going to think
I'm crazy, but hear me out. I hear
Gwanahda Pincers are deadly sharp and
never dull. I know, using anything other
than my trusty knives is unthinkable!
Can you find it in your heart to help
me out?
※Cae de Nv.28+ Gwanahdas."
